title: Looking after Yaimini
creator_credit: Larry Zetlin, Ruth Berry and Gulliver Film Productions
brief_description: A comprehensive and sympathetic portrayal of an Aboriginal family living in an outstation or homelands situation in Central Arnhemland, Northern Territory. Subtitled.
